PyAPI

Readfile

Refactor

Transform

UI

snippet.title: LIGHT LINKING is here! - Blender Today LIVE #229
snippet.description:

Support Blender by joining the Development Fund https://fund.blender.org

#b3d #BlenderToday
* Music by ¬†@Thaehan

---

Changelog
Total: 248 commits, of which 62 are fixes and 72 cleanup.

Animation
* Remove collection hotkeys from pose mode https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/adef3a45
* change Slider Popup menu hotkeys https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/e2a75814

Curves
* Avoid inverting selection when deleting elements https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/865f14c6
* Optmize and simplify point and curve deletion https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/f63cfd8e

Cycles
* light and shadow linking https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/ba3f26fa
* Path Guiding: Adding guiding on glossy surfaces via RIS https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/8d174585

Externals
* Externals: update fmtlib to latest version (10.0.0) https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/122c48ae

GPencil 3.0
* GPencil 3.0: Initial commit https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/3aaacd6e

Geometry Nodes
* expose simulation bake path in UI https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/dc33a8e9
* store path to simulation bake in modifier https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/edf4cb8b

I18n

Mesh
* Mesh: Avoid position copying in corrective smooth modifier https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/72309be3
* Mesh: Reimplement and unify topology maps https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/4d841e1b

Overlay-Next
* Overlay-Next: Initial implementation https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/9ae2dd57

Python API
* PyAPI: add bpy.app.help_text() for accessing output from `--help` https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/3a5ba15c
* PyAPI: add bpy.context.property, for property under the mouse cursor https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/6ba03467

Refactor Render Result to allow implicit buffer sharing
* Refactor Render Result to allow implicit buffer sharing https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/a5677d22

Transform
* Transform: remove precision modification upon starting navigation https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/fc854fc2

UI
* Temporarily Disable Apple-specific Text Modifier Support https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/07dbdd01
* Updated Windows File Registration Correction https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/f37f6093
* Text cursor behavior for Apple Devices https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/0e841924
* Updated Windows File Registration https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/9cf77efa
* Fix and improve a few messages https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/9f0807ac
* set the waiting cursor from pack/unpack operators https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/7fbac7e2

USD Curve Export
* USD Curve Export: Pinned CatmullRom Curve https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/a127707c

UV
* UV: Complete options for rotation during uv packing https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/f96e108b
* UV: Fix (unreported) uv packing with pinned islands and original bounding box https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/71d89dfa

Windows
* Windows: Do not auto-focus from our console https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/1b7c6cf1

snippet.description:

Cycles
* enable HIP-RT for AMD hardware ray-tracing https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/b196109d
* oneAPI: enable hardware raytracing by default https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/66df452d

EEVEE
* EEVEE: Add Transparent Render-Pass option https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/2d66a0ef

Fix

Geometry Nodes
* Make simulation caching optional https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/8efd6d5f
* Implement simulation subframe mixing https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/e6e6fb3a
* Extrude: Skip topology map with no edge attributes https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/5b5e6a84
* Keep loose vert/edge tags for extrude and split edges https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/381fae91
* Slightly optimize mesh to curve node https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/143ca272
* Add Sample Volume node https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/3195c1a6
* Change "Separate Components" node output order to match Spreadsheet https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/f5e3ed77
* Remove realize instances legacy behavior https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/f17ea1f2
* Add 'Signed Distance' input node https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/36983fb5

Introduce utm_source=blender to urls pointing to blender.org
* Introduce utm_source=blender to urls pointing to blender.org https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/a15c637e

Mesh
* Move bevel weight to generic attribute https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/2a56403c
* Remove deprecated face/vert custom data API https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/d41021a7
* Remove sculpt vertex colors from RNA API https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/6805657a

* Convert Color Space node https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/d91f0bf8
* Plane Track Deform node https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/6698e8f4
* Denoise node https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/e8c660b8

Sculpt Fixes

Transform
* Transform: support navigation while transforming in 3D view https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/33c13ae6

* USD Export: New Curves/Hair Support https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/1164976d

* Improve correctness of uv packer https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/4b4babae
* During packing, add progress bar and ability to cancel https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/edc12436
* Simplify packer, improving performance, efficiency and fixing bugs https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/ccb2dbdd

VSE
* VSE: Add go to current frame operator to view menu https://projects.blender.org/blender/blender/commit/40ccc37f

* Curves: use consistent default radius for Cycles, Eevee, Set Curve Radius node https://developer.blender.org/rB8159e0 

I/O
* IO: speed up import of large Alembic/USD/OBJ scenes by optimizing material assignment https://developer.blender.org/rB94323b 
* OBJ: remove "experimental" from C++ based importer/exporter, mark Python legacy https://developer.blender.org/rB8fb8a6 

ADD-ONS
* Rigify: make uniform limb scaling optional and hide the constraint https://developer.blender.org/rBA7ea2e 
* Fix T99335: Rigify horse has wrong parents https://developer.blender.org/rBAe5d87
* Node Wrangler: expose Custom Color property in the Frame Selected operator https://developer.blender.org/D15320 
* glTF exporter: export all actions of a single armature is now under an export option https://developer.blender.org/rBA09d75 
* glTF importer/exporter: Manage some official Khronos Extensions about Materials https://developer.blender.org/rBA042fb 
* AnimAll, and Sun Position: add French translation https://developer.blender.org/rBA7faf9 

PYTHON
* Python: support v3.11 (beta) https://developer.blender.org/rB780c0e 
* PyAPI: add Matrix.is_identity read-only attribute https://developer.blender.org/rB133d39 

POTPOURRI
* BLF: Add Support for Variable Fonts https://developer.blender.org/D12977 
* GHOST/Wayland: support dynamic loading libraries for Wayland https://developer.blender.org/rBe58e02 

FIXES
* Fix T99386: Driven modifiers are always re-evaluated during animation https://developer.blender.org/rBeb7218
